a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

li.a: Pontotoc Ridge Career and Technology Center

div.p: Please note: Due to the Governor's shelter in place order, which begins this Friday at 5 p.m., distance learning packets will be distributed at each main campus (North Upper students/parents will pick up packets at the main NP campus) from 7 a.m.- 4 p.m. this Friday, April 3rd, instead of Monday, April 6th. Again, the distance learning packets will be distributed this Friday at each main campus, from 7 a.m. - 4 p.m. Thanks so much for your understanding and support during this time.

a.title: Go to comments for UPDATE: Distance Learning Packet Distribution Moved to Friday, April 3rd.

span.p: Update for PCSD Student Meal Program (lengthy but important post):

Thanks so much to everyone that helped us distribute food to hundreds of our students this past week. This was our first week and while it went great, we are making a few adjustments to streamline the process. Please read the following information carefully:

The times will now shift to 10:30 a.m. - 11:30 a.m. for all sites unless specifically listed below. All locations from this week will be open on Monday, March 30th, but changes will begin on Tuesday, March 31st.

p.strong: Please note the following changes, which will begin on Tuesday, March 31st:

div.p: Cairo Baptist and Friendship Baptist - these sites will be closed. Please go to North Pontotoc Elementary school if you have been going to these sites.

Hurricane Baptist - this site will be closed. If you have been picking up meals at Hurricane Baptist, please go to the Hurricane Community Center between 10:35 a.m. - 10:50 a.m. A bus will be there between these times with meals.
Toccopola Community Center - this site will be closed. Please go to Carey Springs Baptist or Thaxton Baptist if you have been going to Toccopola.
Troy Baptist Church - A van will now stop at Troy Baptist between 12:00 p.m. - 12:15 p.m. Please be at Troy Baptist between this time to pick up a meal.

North Side:
Cherry Creek Baptist
Endville Baptist
North Pontotoc School
Sherman Church of Christ
Thaxton Baptist Church

South Side:
Carey Springs Baptist
Cooke Baptist Church
Midway Baptist Church
South Pontotoc School

a.title: Go to comments for Important: Update to PCSD Student Meals Program

div.span: Please note: This post is somewhat lengthy, but contains important information pertaining to lunches/breakfasts for our students during this time.

Beginning Monday, March 23rd, PCSD will distribute drive-thru “grab and go” lunches/breakfast for students 18 and under until further notice. These lunches will be free for students and will include a breakfast for the next morning. Meals will be available at the following locations during the times of 10:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.

In addition, two bus routes will deliver food to specific locations in the North area. Each bus will have food at the first location at 10:30, then move to the next location from there. Students will need to be watching and listening for the bus (drivers will honk). These routes are as follows:
Route One Stops (in order): Possom Trot, Swords Lane, Graham Road, Smoketop
Route Two (in order): J. Sewell Cove, Brassfield, Harmony Loop
***Please note: We are still awaiting confirmation on one other location and will update asap.

In addition, two bus routes will deliver food to specific locations in the South area. Each bus will have food at the first location at 10:30, then move to the next location from there. Students will need to be watching and listening for the bus (drivers will honk). These routes are as follows:
Route One (in order): Shanda Ridge laundromat, Kizer Trail, Post Oak Dr.
Route Two (in order): Salmon Rd, Evergreen Dr.

Please note: It may take a couple of days to get everything working exactly right, so please know that we will make adjustments as needed. Our main goal is to ensure that no child in our district goes without a breakfast/lunch during this time. If you live in an area where one of the buses is coming through, please try to watch and listen between 10:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. Again, the stop areas are listed in order above.

Thanks again for your support, patience, and assistance during this time. PCSD would like to extend a special thanks to each of the churches listed above as well. Please continue to monitor all of our social media outlets for updates during this time.

a.title: Go to comments for Student Breakfast/Lunch During Coronavirus-Related Closings
